rooms.name: TheNorthPole_Orientation
rooms.description: You have arrived at the entry point to this year’s KringleCon. In front of you you can see a green fence.

junctions.description: In front of you

objectives.name: JingleRingford
objectives.description: an Elf standing next to a Terminal for „Objective 1 - KringleCon Orientation“

rooms.name: TheNorthPole_TheNorthPole
rooms.description: You are standing in the main location of this year’s KringleCon and FrostFest. At the left side you can see the KringleCon building, at the right side there is the Frostfest tower.

junctions.description: Behind of you
On the left side
On the right side

rooms.name: KringleCon_Entry
rooms.description: You have entered the entry room of the KringleCon. At the left side there is a festive Christmas tree, at the right side there is an elevator. A few pictures are hanging at the walls.

rooms.description: You are standing in the dining room. A huge wooden table is located at the center. A few pictures are hanging at the walls.
